headline: Graffiti by Anonymous in Brighton
place: Western Rd, Brighton and Hove, The City of Brighton and Hove BN1, UK

updates.body: This was on Western Road but have seen it in the North Laine, South Lanes, Brighton seafront, Hove seafront, Seven Dials and elsehwere too.
A lot of there slogans are from online memes popular amongst teens and young people.

Been seeing more and more Anonymous graffiti and posters popping up all over Brighton and Hove in recent months. It's not clear if it is just one person, several working together or various individuals but then that's pretty much how Anonymous works. They seem to be rather like a modern day version of the Situationists but here's the wiki entry for them: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anonymous_(group)
